gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: SESAR is a centralized registry that provides and administers unique identifiers for Geoscience samples - the International Geo Sample Number (IGSN).

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Index to Marine and Lacustrine Geological Samples

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NGDC Marine Geology and Geophysics Division
World Data Center for Geophysics and Marine Geology

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: Index to Marine and Lacustrine Geological Samples

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The IMLGS is a collaboration between twenty institutions and agencies that operate geological sample repositories. The purpose of the database is to help researchers locate sea floor and lakebed cores, grabs, dredges, and drill samples in their collections.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: SUMMARYabout the sample: sample type, location of acquisition, material type, field program, time period, data collector, and program name and COLLECTION METHOD DESCRIPTION

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: U.S. Geological Survey, Woods Hole Coastal and Marine Science Center

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: IHO-IOC GEBCO Gazetteer of undersea feature names

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: GEBCO Sub-Committee on Undersea Feature Names (SCUFN)

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: IHO-IOC GEBCO Gazetteer of undersea feature names

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: All names selected by SCUFN are contained in the GEBCO Gazetteer of Geographic Names of Undersea Features.

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: COMMENTS ABOUT SAMPLE OR ANY OTHER ADDITIONAL INFO

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Information about condition and availability of ECS samples, and forms to request sample material.
